vv53:12.4: suvaṇṇachannā → suvaṇṇacchadanā (bj) | suvaṇṇachadanā (s2, s3, pts1) | suvaṇṇacchādanā (pts2)
vv53:15.1: Jinavarapavaraṃ → jinapavaraṃ (s2, s3, mr), upehi → upemi (s2, s3, pts1-2)
vv53:15.3: avocahaṃ → avocāhaṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2, mr)
vv53:17.4: tathevakāsiṃ → ayaṃ gāthā s2, s3 potthakesu
vv53:28.1: cidha → yedha (si, s2, s3, pts1-2) | ye idha (mr)
